definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: thicken, condense, congeal (cf. Syr. qp0 heap up, collect);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[קָֽפְאוּ תְהׂמׂת]] Ex 15:8 (song) the deeps were condensed, became firm walls; Impf. [[יקפאון]] Zec 14:6 Kt (i.e. [[יִקְפָּאָוּן]] [poss. is also [[יִקָּפֵאָוּן]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: ]) Thes al. glorious(?) ones [stars] shall contract (dwindle), but rd. Qr [[וְפָּאוֹן]] v. foll. Pt. [[הַקּׂפְאִים עַלאשִׁמְרַיהֶם]] Zep 1:12 the men who are thickening on their lees (easy-going men, under figure of undisturbed wine).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[תַּקְפִּיאֵנִי]] Job 10:10 didst thou not curdle me like cheese (of formation of foetus) ?
